text: Steven Alfred (born 11 October 1997) is a Nigerian football player who plays in Armenia for FC Pyunik on loan from Sochi. ==Club career== Alfred made his debut in the Russian Football National League for PFC Sochi on 16 March 2019 in a game against FC Krasnodar-2.
